Reviews.AuthorLocation: Ocean City, New Jersey, United States
Reviews.Title: “Very Good Motel, Location Not So Much”
Reviews.Author: Penguin1968
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff and spacious rooms. We got a non-smoking room and it didn't smell, the heat worked fine. Breakfast was adequate, overall great for the price I paid. Only drawback is it's a 10-15 minute ride to any downtown locations like Beale St. or Graceland. The area the motel is in is also kind of seedy, but felt safe however.

Reviews.Title: “Very good!”
Reviews.Author: NikoLatina
Reviews.Content: My review was very positive, very nice all the staff of the hotel (near the airport), very comfortable room with heating, TV, room service etc. The breakfast was pretty good, overall, the hotel was very satisfactory. the staff did everything possible because I was well, a special thanks from me, Niko

Reviews.Title: “A little scary...”
Reviews.Author: crazzy_jessy
Reviews.Content: Once we pulled in we realized we were the only guest and the parking lot was set up with camaras from the Memphis police dept. We were immediately concerned. The area is also very concerning. We walked into the lobby and noticed an unpleasant stinch but were greeted by pleasant staff. When we reached our room we once again opened the door to the same stinch but after getting a little air circulating it was better. The room was ok and was nicely equipped with with a microwave and refigerator. The door however had a crack in it even when closed and bolted which let us feeling even more unsecure. The train near the hotel starts running about 6:30am so no sleeping in unless you can sleep through a train. The next morning we ran into some other guests who commented its nice to see someone else...and we felt the same! The owner's suite door had bars over them which also left us feeling very uneasy. There were many signs posted around the property and in the room to keep valuables on you at all times which led us to believe they had probably had a problem with theft. And then breakfast was a disaster I would suggest you skip it altogether! The juice both apple and orange wasn't even recognizable the coffee left something to be desired. The hot waffle was good and that was it!

Reviews.Title: “Very good for the price”
Reviews.Author: M--R7667
Reviews.Content: I was impressed, some of the reviews weren't that great for this hotel. The employees were very nice. The room was clean including the bathroom. The continental breakfast had a lot to choose from. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “stinky (phew) !!”
Reviews.Author: benglish8
Reviews.Content: We used this hotel just to stay for one night on our way to Tenn. First thing when I opened the door was a smell that about made me pass out. Smelled like a stinky armpit had been living in the thing for a few months!! Second was that out air condition was not on and ready for us to enter the room so it was hot and musty in there till it cooled off!! Last thing I want to do after driving many hours is lay in a hot stinky room!! Third there were someones nasty socks on the side of the bed when we walked in, where did they come from!! The remote was sticky too!! Yuck!! When the air finally cooled off and everyone was ready for bed it was ok!!

Reviews.Title: “Nicely rennovated room!”
Reviews.Author: Djpeterman
Reviews.Content: When we first came into this neighborhood we were a little nervous about what to expect. Our room was awesome! Very clean and comfortable. It had a couch which was nice after traveling. Not just your typical bed and chair. This was a very nice treat.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it !”
Reviews.Author: Twotravelers204
Reviews.Content: Very, very nice room. Our two night stay was great! The room was clean, spacious and just what we were looking for. Quite location in driving distance of many attractions. The staff answered all the questions regarding travel destinations. My husband and I would definitely recommend this hotel. Great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Forever Grateful”
Reviews.Author: binxy1
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent 1 night on our way through to TX. My husband was on R and R. We got in late and were greeted warmly by the clerk. We were in a rush to leave the next morning and I left my $500 bracelet on the counter. It was hidden under some newspapers. We called and the manager found my bracelet and fed-exed it to me the next day. Cannot express enough gratitude!

Reviews.Title: “Not great”
Reviews.Author: couple2kids
Reviews.Content: The room smelled musty, the tub was stained, the bathroom was not the cleanest and the air conditioner was wonky. The internet was too slow to be useful.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice for the Price”
Reviews.Author: TexasTazman
Reviews.Content: We had a hard time picking out a hotel for our Memphis/Graceland stay, so picked this one mainly because it looked like it was pretty close to the airport and I thought the area would be decent. We thought it was a very nice, large room and the location was easy to get too and seemed to be very safe. The hotel staff was great and gave us good directions to the local Neeley's BBQ Restaurant, which was excellent. We could not get over how nice everyone was in Memphis and always very helpful and did not seem to get annoyed at all the tourist questions, etc. We would stay there again, if every back in Memphis.

Reviews.Title: “I love the hotel and location”
Reviews.Author: onesecret
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel, The cleanliness of the room was very refreshing after a long night at work. The hotel front desk staff were very friendly. Scott checked me in and was very attentive to my needs of a quite room. Ms. Erica checked me out and also let me extend my checkout time. It was much appreciated. The location of the hotel was in a very good location off of the interstate(easy to find) I would recommend this hotel to all of my friends and family. I will be coming back real soon.

HotelInfo.Name: Days Inn & Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 3685 American Way, Memphis, TN 38118 (Formerly Comfort Suites - Memphis / American Way)
